subject: [ADV]ZIM-Basic P2P IM for LAN
msgSnippet: Hello Java Testing Experts, Here s a Java and JXTA based P2P Instant Messenger for LAN. The community edition (ZIM-Basic) is available for free download and
messageBody:
Hello Java Testing Experts,
Here's a Java and JXTA based P2P Instant Messenger for LAN. The community
edition (ZIM-Basic) is available for free download and remains free through
out its product life.

http://www.zudha.com/zim.html

Please test it out if possible and provide your valuable feedback for
improvements.

The best (and of course constructive !!) test report may be considered for
rewards :-)

We see a challenge in Unit testing of p2p apps and are learning how to use
JUnit for P2P applications. Any inputs (offline or on this list) are most
welcome.


ZIM Team
Zudha Tech




-------------------------------------------------
This mail sent through IMP: http://horde.org/imp/
